page.title: 17SCHOOLS IN HELSTON (1)
page.content: Helston has one large secondary comprehensive school and three junior schools, each with an infant department. Twenty five years ago there was only one infant school, St Michael's Infants, in Church Hill(next to St Michael's Church), one junior school, St Michael's, and Helston Grammar School. The comprehensive school has over 1600 pupils from the ages of 11 to 18 and incorporates two older schools on its site-Helston Grammar School, which now forms the lower school of the comprehensive, and Gwealhellis secondary modern school, which now forms the middle school.
